The profiling data

The output of the profiling data

The timeout attribute value should be a long (see also the model method void org.eclipse.hyades.models.trace.TRCThreadWaitingForObjectEvent.setTimeout(long value)):

In the attached trace the value is not long:
<monWaited threadIdRef="3" time="1177011501.446501969" objIdRef="4" timeout="1.540727976">

Ali - Can you pls validate that this is resolved and close this defect

Thanks
I was not able to reproduce the problem with TPTP-4.4.0-200704251212.  Marking the defect as fixed.
